name: Amethyst Waters
description:
Controls
  • Arrow Keys: movement
  • Z: shoot
  • X: shoot vertically
  • A/S: change weapons (after you've unlocked them)

The game won't save your acquired weapons on the browser. To do so, you have to download TIC-80 and use it to play the amethist_waters.tic cartridge in the downloads section.


Amethyst Waters

Explore deep sea caverns with your submarine in this procedurally generated shoot 'em up.

Check the full source code on GitHub.

Created for the Spring Lisp Game Jam 2020.
